WorkItem.Description:
Currently, PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 only produces correct UTF-8 output when mbstring extension is enabled. But many PHP installations do not have mbstring extension enabled. In these cases, characters outside ASCII range may not be displayed correctly.
Â 
We fix this by using iconv functions as a fallback when mbstring extension is not enabled.
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 iconv fallback when mbstring extension is not enabled
